top_categories.workout_context: Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo's South Carolina coastal forest, Forest gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 65 miles.
Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo's South Carolina coastal forest gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before March.
When someone attacks on South Carolina coastal forest gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo. Train it until it feels boring.
65 miles on South Carolina coastal forest gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
At Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
2-minute all-out efforts on South Carolina coastal forest gravel. Closing gaps, responding to attacks, sprinting for position. Train the burn.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Base fitness for Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
Smooth pedaling at 65 miles saves muscle. Bad technique at mile 10 is invisible. At mile 80 it's a cramp.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo’s 65 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Swamp Fox Gravel Fondo requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on south carolina coastal forest gravel to build confidence. Expect: south carolina coastal forest, forest gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, TT Threshold, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 65 miles of south carolina coastal forest gravel in Francis Marion National Forest, South Carolina.
